works.description:
My copyrighted image of Cyon that  
continues be used was taken in 2010 by Ace Ujmori, during a series of
photo  
shoots organized and paid for by myself for specific publicity of one of  

our projects, the 50Faggots documentary series, owned through SocialScope 

Productions, Inc. My goal is to continue to have these images associated  

primarily with the 50Faggots series and SociaScope. However, since the  
photo was used without contacting me or copyright permission, this  
particular use dilutes the image  of SocialScope and 50Faggots since it
now  
is associated with outside club/event imagery not in conjunction with my  

series or SocialScope.
